steps: Log into the virtual session 10 minutes before the start time using the link provided.
Gather all the materials in an orderly fashion on your workspace.
Listen to the instructor as they explain different water coloring techniques.
Try out the techniques as demonstrated on your paper.
Ask questions or requests assistance via the chat or audio feature during breaks.
Participate in the group sharing where children can showcase their work.
End with a quick feedback session.
safety: Ensure children do not ingest or have prolonged skin contact with paints. Keep water away from electronics.
